quote: Pride is not the opposite of shame, but its source. True humility is the only antidote to shame.
Sharing tea with a fascinating stranger is one of life’s true delights
Sometimes life is like this tunnel. You can’t always see the light at the end of the tunnel, but if you keep moving, you will come to a better place
Life happens wherever you are, whether you make it or not.
You have come to the crossroads of your destiny. It is time for you to choose. It is time for you to choose good.
There is nothing wrong with a life of peace and prosperity. I suggest you think about what it is you want from your life, and why.
It is important to draw wisdom from many different places. If you take it from only one place it becomes rigid and stale.
Hope is something you give yourself. That is the meaning of inner strength.
Destiny is a funny thing. You never know how things are going to work out.
While it is always best to believe in oneself, a little help from others can be a great blessing.
It is usually best to admit mistakes when they occur, and to seek to restore honor.
Be careful what you wish for, admiral. History is not always kind to its subjects.
Failure is only the opportunity to begin again.
Sometimes, the best way to solve your own problems is to help someone else.
Protection and power are overrated. I think you are very wise to choose happiness and love.
Good times become good memories, but bad times make good lessons.
Even in the material world, you will find that if you look for the light, you can often find it. But if you look for the dark, that is all you will ever see.
You have light and peace inside of you. If you let it out, you can change the world around you.
Many things that seem threatening in the dark become welcoming when we shine light on them.
There is nothing wrong with letting people who love you, help you.
Follow your passion and life will reward you.
